body.p:
To the Hon. Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of Ky

Your petitioner respectfuly sheweth, That at the February 1864. sitting of the Grand Jury for the County of Garrard, a True bill was returned against him, for the offence of Gambling, and, that he was fined in the amount of $20- He states that he has, made up his mind to totally abandon the habit of Gaming, and if consistent with the policy and feeling of Your Honor, will recognize his lasting obligations, to have the fine remitted
